Rules.Title: When BeneficiaryName contains "Glovo" or "Wolt" categorize transaction as 4 (Food & Dining / Restaurants)
When BeneficiaryName contains "Orange" or "A1 Telecom" categorize transaction as 10 (Bills & Utilities / Internet)
Rules.Predicate: BeneficiaryName LIKE '%Orange%' OR BeneficiaryName LIKE '%A1 Telecom%'

Rules.Title: When Mcc is 8299 (Caterers) categorize transaction as 17 (Education / Tuition)
When Mcc is 5499 (Caterers) categorize transaction as 38 (Food & Dining / Groceries)
When Mcc is 7523 (Caterers) categorize transaction as 5 (Auto & Transport / Parking)
When Mcc is 5733 (Caterers) categorize transaction as 22 (Entertainment / Music)
